Package com.developersboard.backend.service.storage.impl

Class MockAmazonS3ServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.backend.service.storage.impl.AbstractAmazonS3Service
com.developersboard.backend.service.storage.impl.MockAmazonS3ServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AmazonS3Service
@Service @Profile("dev") public class MockAmazonS3ServiceImpl extends AbstractAmazonS3Service
This class provides mock operations available to Amazon S3 Service.
Since:
1.0
